ygData.subject: Re: How Can I Raise 2H Slashing?
ygData.msgSnippet: That is basically it. To raise skills quickly you must attempt harder stuff. Running around killing greens will get your skill up eventually but really slowly.
ygData.messageBody:
That is basically it. To raise skills quickly you must attempt harder stuff.
Running around killing greens will get your skill up eventually but really
slowly. To progress steadily attack blues, and to go fast attack yellows and
above. How? Given your crap at the skill and won't last long against yellows?
Kill Steal!! :) Seriously though, when you see othe people attack targets ask
them if they mind you attacking it to practice your skills. this will allow you
to practice against the harder targets with relative safety. Most people won't
mind since you wont do much damage, but you do get the occasionaly jerks.

Hopw this helps

Inos


Shanti Ashtangi wrote:

> From: "Shanti Ashtangi" <zealpath@...>
>
> I'm a level 11 dark elf shadowknight, and while I love the 1H mino
> axe/shield combo, I'm also interested in using 2H weapons, especially if the
> Dark Reaver turns out to be a 2H weapons. Howver I've picked up a 2H sword
> and only managed to raise the skill to 5, now it won't move at all (and
> has't been for quite some time). Do I need to fight monsters that con blue
> or something like that? Those of you who have successfully raised 2H please
> let me know how you've done it, although I suppose I'll always favor 1H
> since I'l need a shield to bash as a dark elf.
>
